1: <pb/><e>Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj David.</e> <pb/><t>A Jehová tz'ac'an saquilq'uinal d'ayin, in Columal paxi. ¿Machto val b'aj syal in xivi? A tzin colani, yuj chi' malaj b'aj tzin xivi.</t>
2: <t>A eb' chuc smol sb'a d'a in patic yic tzin satanel eb' yalani, palta a eb' ayoch ajc'olal chi' d'ayin, ol lajvoquel eb'.</t>
3: <t>Vach'chom junoc b'ulan soldado tz'och oyan d'a in patic vichan̈, val yel, man̈ ol in xivlaj. Vach'chom sq'ue vaan eb' yac' oval ved'oc, an̈eja' vac'anoch Dios yipoc in c'ool.</t>
4: <t>Junn̈ej val tas tzin c'an d'a Jehová, aton jun tic tzin nib'ej: To tzin ec' d'a stemplo Dios yacb'an pitzan in yic svil snivanil yelc'och Dios chi', svac'anpaxem in b'a d'ay.</t>
5: <t>Ayic ol javoc yaelal d'a vib'an̈, a ol in c'ub'aneloc. A d'a scajnub', ata' ol in sc'ub'ejeli. Ol in yic'q'ue d'a yib'an̈ junoc q'ueen yic tzin colchajcaneli.</t>
6: <t>Ichaton val chi' ol aj in scolancanel d'a eb' ajc'ool oyanoch d'a in patic vichan̈. D'a scal av yed' tzalajc'olal ol vac' in silab' d'a Jehová d'a yol stemplo. Ol val vach' lolonel d'a b'ital d'ay.</t>
7: <t>Mamin, a d'ayach tzin avaji, cha ab' d'ayin. Oc'oc val a c'ool d'ayin, tac'van̈ d'ayin.</t>
8: <t>Mamin Jehová, a in pensar ix alan d'ayin to tzin nitzcot in b'a d'a a tz'ey. Yuj chi' svac' vip in nitzanoch in b'a d'a a tz'ey chi'.</t>
9: <t>Man̈ a c'ub'ejel a b'a d'ayin. Man̈ in a chec meltzaj yed' yoval a c'ool. A achtaxon tzin a colo'. Ach in Diosal in Columal ach, man̈ in actejcan in ch'ocoj.</t>
10: <t>Mamin Jehová, vach'chom tzin yactejcan eb' in mam in nun, palta a ach ol in a tan̈vej.</t>
11: <t>Mamin, ch'ox a b'e d'ayin, ic' in b'at d'a yol b'e tojol, yuj eb' ajc'ool snib'an in yac'an telvoc.</t>
12: <t>Man̈ in ac'canoch d'a yol sc'ab' eb' ayoch ajc'olal d'ayin. Sq'ue vaan eb' d'a in patic, syesan in muloc eb'. Sgana eb' tzin yac' chamoc.</t>
13: <t>Mamin Jehová, svac'och d'a in c'ool to ol a ch'ox a vach'c'olal d'ayin yacb'an pitzan into, tato maay, toxom ix pax vip naic.</t>
14: <t>Ex vetchon̈ab', aq'uecoch Jehová yipoc e c'ool. Tec'tec' tzeyutej e b'a, man̈ eyac' chab'ax e c'ool. Val yel, aq'uecn̈ejoch Jehová yipoc e c'ool.</t>
